1 [0x0][0x4]: Order your companion to follow you.
Allow your companion to make his own decisions in battle.
Order your companion to focus on defensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <color #FF7B1A>Defender</color> skill tree.
Order your companion to focus more on offensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <color #FF7B1A>Attacker</color> skill tree.
Order your companion to stop fighting and concentrate on healing maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <color #FF7B1A>Healer</color> skill tree.
